attacks.name: Sacred Fire
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

attacks.name: Aeroblast
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Recharge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to Pikachu. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy attached to Pikachu.

abilities.name: Tenacious Bind
abilities.effect: As long as Wobbuffet is your Active Pokémon, your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost is ColorlessColorless more.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

abilities.name: Night Scope
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before you attack), you may look at your opponent's hand. This Power can't be used if Noctowl is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Water Energy card from your hand to 1 of your Water Pokémon. This power can't be used if Feraligatr is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Hydro Crunch
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

abilities.name: Leaf Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move a Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Meganium is affected by a Special Condition.

abilities.name: Afterburner
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your discard pile for a Fire Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. If you do, put 1 damage counter on that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Typhlosion is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Flare Destroy
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Energy Assist
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a basic Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Infinite Wind
attacks.effect: If Latios is on your Bench, remove 2 damage counters from each of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.name: Luster Float
abilities.effect: If you have Latias in play, the Retreat Cost for Latios is 0.

attacks.name: Infinite Wing
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Latios.

abilities.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
abilities.effect: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.

attacks.name: Eeeeeeek
attacks.effect: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards. Cleffa is now Asleep.

abilities.name: Sweet Sleeping Face
abilities.effect: As long as Smoochum is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Smoochum from attacks.

attacks.name: Energy Antics
attacks.effect: Move an Energy card attached to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon to another one of your opponent's Pokémon. Smoochum is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Ferry
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand.

abilities.name: Fermenting Liquid
abilities.effect: Whenever you attach an Energy card from your hand to Shuckle, draw a card.

attacks.name: Shell Stunner
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shuckle by attacks during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Collect
attacks.effect: Draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does 10 damage to Plusle.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Tag Team Boost
attacks.effect: If Plusle is on your Bench, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

cards.name: Tropical Tidal Wave
cards.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard all Trainer cards your opponent has in play. If tails, discard all Trainer cards (excluding Supporter cards) you have in play.

attacks.name: Zap Cannon
attacks.effect: During your next turn, Raikou can't use Zap Cannon.

attacks.name: Flare Blitz
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Entei.

attacks.name: Sheer Cold
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon can't attack during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Porygon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Version Update
attacks.effect: Search your deck for Porygon2, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

abilities.name: Shortcut
abilities.effect: The Retreat Cost for each Porygon, Porygon2, and Porygon-Z you have in play is Colorless less.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: Porygon2 does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Detect
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Sky Uppercut
attacks.effect: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
